meta.title: Confession of Transgressions of Tantric Vows/Commitments

nodes.title: Confession of Transgressions of Tantric Vows/Commitments
Example Texts
nodes.body:
• Gsang sngags gsar rnying gi ring lugs dang ‘brel ba rdo rje theg pa’i dam tshig gi nyes ltung bshags pa kun tu bzang po’i khrus char 
  • Rtsa ltung bcu bzhi ngos ‘dzin dang gshags pa bya tshul 
  • See also sngags ltung bcos thabs
